law.catch_line: Application of provisions of KRS 342.316(4) to certain asbestos-related disease claims.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 342.316(4) shall apply to employees' asbestos-related disease claims filed on or after July 15, 1986.
law.history: Amended 1996 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 70, effective December 12, 1996. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 317, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996.
